title: Bless International Beautiful Indian Bohemian Psychedelic Hippie Peacock Mandala Window Curtain Panels for Bedroom, Living, Shower & Balcony (Golden Blue (38x83 Inches)(96x210 Cms))
features: READY MADE: Set includes 2 CURTAINS PANELS of 25"(63CM) wide x 74"(188CM) length. These sheer curtain panels are 2.5 inch rod pocket panels. Quality 100% cotton fabric in beautiful Mandala Designs. Package Includes 2 Pcs of curtains.
HANDICRAFT: These aren't just window curtain panels. These are the handicrafts, made by local artisans and printed by hand. These curtains give a classy and elegant look in your room.

USAGE: Bedroom, living, shower & balcony and home decor like Window Decor, Window Decal, Decorative Accessories, indoor, Living Room Accessories, Bed Room, Window Treatment, Door Cover, Room Divider, Wall Curtains.
EASY TO MAINTAIN: Bless International curtains are made to last. Machine washable in cold water, tumble dry. Quick ironing or steam clean when needed.

GIFT IDEAS: These are also the ideal gifts for Housewarming, Birthdays, Christmas, Weddings, Father’s Day, Mother's Day, Anniversaries, Retirement, Baby Showers, Bridal Showers, Valentine’s Day, Gift for the Hostess and the Dinner party and for simply saying Thank You to someone.
